content: You just had a conversation. With whom did you have this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: I had a conversation with Peter Schmidt from Germany.
name: Haoyu Wang

content: What was the main topic of this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: The main topic of the conversation was the rental price of the apartment in Magdeburg.
name: Haoyu Wang

content: Did you agree on a final price? Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator

content: The landlord, Peter Schmidt, was not willing to negotiate the rental price below 650 Euro per month. I offered 620 Euro per month, but he did not accept it.
name: Haoyu Wang

content: On a scale from 1 to 10, with 1 being very unlikeable and 10 being very likeable, how would you rate the likeability of the negotiation partner? Tell me the exact number.
name: Evaluator

content: Why did you rate the likeability as a 7? Please provide specific reasons.
name: Evaluator

content: [Answer] I rated the likeability as a 7 because the landlord, Peter Schmidt, was clear and direct in his communication. He was respectful in his refusal to negotiate the rental price below the asking price of 650 Euro per month. However, the negotiation did not result in an agreement due to the price difference.
name: Haoyu Wang

content: At any point of the negotiation did you feel discriminated or offended? Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator
